B

BEGIN_TURN - Static variable in class konaneCommon.Konane
Bytecode for the server signaling a client to begin a turn.
BEGIN_TURN_ACK - Static variable in class konaneCommon.Konane
Bytecode for a client acknowledging a signal to begin a turn.
BLACK - Static variable in class konaneCommon.Konane
Constant representing the black side in a game.
BLACK_PORT_NUMBER - Static variable in class konaneCommon.Konane
TCP port number used for communication between the server and the black client.
BOARD - Static variable in class konaneCommon.Konane
Bytecode for the server sending BoardGrid dimensions to a client.
BOARD_ACK - Static variable in class konaneCommon.Konane
Bytecode for the client acknowledging BoardGrid dimensions from the server.
BOARD_SYNC - Static variable in class konaneCommon.Konane
Bytecode for the server sending an entire BoardGrid to a client.
BOARD_SYNC_ACK - Static variable in class konaneCommon.Konane
Bytecode for a client acknowledging an entire BoardGrid from the server.
BoardGrid - class konaneCommon.BoardGrid.
The Konane gameboard.
BoardGrid() - Constructor for class konaneCommon.BoardGrid
Empty default constructor.
BoardGrid(byte[][], int, int) - Constructor for class konaneCommon.BoardGrid
Constructor that accepts an array of tokens to copy, along with the width and height of the board.
BoardGrid(int, int) - Constructor for class konaneCommon.BoardGrid
Constructor that accepts the width and height of the board.

C

copy() - Method in class konaneCommon.BoardGrid
Returns a new instance of the board with the same width, height, and tokens values.

Konane.BLACK => "BLACK"
Konane.NONE => "NONE"
